alert.note: Alert for Buchanan (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 05 at 12:29AM CDT until July 05 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 AM CDT FOR BUCHANAN...CLINTON...NORTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTHEASTERN PLATTE... SOUTHEASTERN ANDREW AND DEKALB COUNTIES... At 1229 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near King City to near Smithville, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... St. Joseph, Smithville, Plattsburg, Lathrop, Weston, Gower, Maysville, Stewartsville, Agency, Trimble, Edgerton, Dearborn, Camden Point, Holt, Union Star, Osborn, Clarksdale, Easton, Turney and Cosby. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 in Missouri near mile marker 30. Interstate 29 between mile markers 24 and 50. Interstate 229 between mile markers 0 and 2. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
